body.name: Paula’s Choice Calm Nourishing Milky Toner for Sensitive Skin, Calms + Soothes Redness, Suitable for Rosacea-Prone & Eczema-Prone Skin, Fragrance-Free & Paraben-Free, 4 Fl Oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: LIGHTWEIGHT HYDRATION FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: This gentle face toner immediately replenishes hydration and nutrients right after cleansing.
VISIBLY REDUCE REDNESS: A specialized mix of skin-replenishing and calming ingredients work to quickly soothe red, irritated skin.
SOOTHE & STRENGTHEN: Research-backed plant extracts support skin’s microbiome + barrier to help prevent signs of sensitivity in the future.
SUITABLE FOR ROSACEA- & ECZEMA-PRONE SKIN: Gentle formula is made for even the most sensitive of skin types.
SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: As part of our pledge to the planet, we’re removing extra plastic from packaging, like shrink wrap.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes science-backed products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, cruelty-free formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.
body.description: CALM Nourishing Milky Toner’s new + improved mix of skin-replenishing and anti-aging ingredients smooth, soften and visibly lessen redness. Ophiopogum japonicus root supports skin’s microbiome + barrier to help prevent signs of sensitivity. Marshmallow root shields from irritants while providing emollient and skin-healing benefits. Instantly hydrates and soothes with a specialized mix of antioxidants and skin-replenishing ingredients for healthier, more resilient skin over time. Ongoing use helps reduce signs of sensitivity and visible aging. Gentle enough even for skin prone to rosacea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it so far
reviews.reviewText: Only been using it a couple weeks, but I like it so far. It’s thick and milky so you really only need a couple dashes, the other toner I’d used was kind of like water so this was a learning adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for me!
reviews.reviewText: I have oily/combi skin but especially oily in t zone. I have larger pores and texturized skin and Ive been using this toner because I heard milky toners help with reducing pore size and appearance. I use a couple drops on a cotton pad and use it night time only. You only need a few drops cause if you soak the whole pad, it feels kinda oily and you wake up oily lol. But so far, it works well for me! My skin is soft and smooth (-:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saved my sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I get a lot of redness around my chin area and this calmed it down! Doesn’t break me out or dry me out, this is a new staple in my routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Part of my routine
reviews.reviewText: I have some really red/combo oily-dry skin. I use this every morning with a cica gel and it truly works wonders. Instantly moisturizes and hydrates and help eliminate some redness from my face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good. Did not work for my skin type.
reviews.reviewText: This product is alright, it feels good on the skin but it made me break out because I have really dry skin. Probably wouldn’t buy this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars New formulation a huge disappointment!
reviews.reviewText: Not sure why this company changed the original formula. It not only smells “chemically” but does NOT properly remove makeup, especially eye makeup (non-waterproof!). The original formula was so much better and if you compare the ingredient list, this new version is cheap and far less ingredients. So disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very moisturizing and refreshing - but does not make my skin feel as clean AND moisturized as the "enriched calming toner" does

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not Flare Up Friendly
reviews.reviewText: I have acne, dermatitis, and rosacea prone skin and was looking for a toner that would help deep clean my pores and take off what washing didn't without any irritation. If my dermatitis or rosacea is flared, this stuff is a no go. It burrrrns! I also found that it did not reduce any of the pink blotchiness that I have on a daily basis.The only pro I can give is that it did not dry my skin out.
